entities.name: snivellus
entities.description: Snivellus is mentioned as a person being spoken to by Sirius. ("I’ve warned you, Snivellus")

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is the one speaking to Snape and warning him. ("I’ve warned you, Snivellus")

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is being spoken to by Sirius and is mentioned as having reformed. ("I don’t care if Dumbledore thinks you’ve reformed")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who might not take Snape’s advice seriously. ("Or are you afraid he might not take the advice of a man...")

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as someone who recognized Sirius and is delighted that his lapdog is working at Hogwarts. ("Tell me, how is Lucius Malfoy these days? I expect he’s delighted...")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who yelled and tried to get in between Sirius and Snape. ("NO! Harry yelled, vaulting over the table...")

relationships.description: Sirius is confronting Snape about his reformation. ("I’ve warned you, Snivellus")
Snape is defiant towards Sirius and suggests that he is afraid of Dumbledore’s opinion. ("Or are you afraid he might not take the advice...")
Lucius Malfoy recognized Sirius when he went outside. ("did you know that Lucius Malfoy recognized you last time you risked a little jaunt...")
Harry intervened between Sirius and Snape when Sirius raised his wand. ("NO! Harry yelled, vaulting over the table...")
